projects.notes: Project structure and docker-compose scaffold included. UI project list will be added in next phases.

chat.notes: Uses Mistral chat completions with tool calling.

workflow.notes: Multi-step iterative builder loop with post-run Architect compression, persistent notes, and Meta-Review optimization. Artifacts saved under backend/workspace/runs/.

run_artifacts.notes: Lists and reads run artifacts (run.json, architect_summary.json, notes.md, meta_review.json).

agents_api.notes: Lightweight wrapper over Mistral agents-style behavior.

web_research.notes: Will integrate Mistral web_search + local browser automation (Playwright preferred, ChromeDriver optional).

vision_review.notes: Will use a vision model to critique preview screenshots and propose UI improvements.

screen_annotation.notes: In-app screenshot mark-up to target UI components without file paths.

deployment.notes: Will support local and remote deployments behind explicit permission gates.
